title: Unmasker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Unmask someone each night. You'll get a description of their appearance based on a literal interpretation of their role's name.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Whenever you're attacked, you'll get a description of your attacker based on a literal interpretation of their role's name.

desc:
Post 349
*Let's see who you really are!*
